name: CV
body:
### Vsevolod Strukchinsky.

Hi! 

### Education

* Ural State University (Computer Science Bachelor)

### Work Experience

[[My linkedin profile](http://www.linkedin.com/img/webpromo/btn_viewmy_160x25.png)](http://ru.linkedin.com/pub/%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B4-%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9/58/598/692).

I started my career as a programmer in SKB Kontur. I wrote windows printer driver for Diadoc-Printer on C++. After that I was writing stuff on C# for a while and ended up writing statistic aggregation tool on Python (handwritten map-reduce for Cassandra).

Now I working on my own project: Auxilium - multiplayer game on node.js ([vkontakte app](vk.com/app1904453_18616688))

### Contact
Write me at [floatdrop@gmail.com](floatdrop@gmail.com)
